trans-unit.source: Flying Discard a card: Prognostic Sphinx gains hexproof until end of turn. Tap it. Whenever Prognostic Sphinx attacks, scry 3.

Create two 3/3 green Centaur enchantment creature tokens. If it's your turn, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

trans-unit.resname: CP1·3 | Font of Fertility | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Font of Fertility: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: CP1·3 | Font of Fertility | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Drink deep, and know the path to the heart of the wilds.
{X}{X}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Hydra Broodmaster becomes monstrous, create X X/X green Hydra creature tokens.

trans-unit.resname: CP1·5 | Prophet of Kruphix | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Untap all creatures and lands you control during each other player's untap step. You may cast creature spells as though they had flash.

trans-unit.resname: CP1·5 | Prophet of Kruphix | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Time is fluid as a dance, and truth as fleeting."

trans-unit.resname: CP1·6 | Temple of Mystery | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.
